# Crypto Pair Comparison Dashboard

This is a Next.js project created with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS.

## Project Setup Completed

- [x] Next.js project scaffolded with TypeScript
- [x] Tailwind CSS configured
- [x] App Router structure created
- [x] Crypto Pair Comparison Dashboard component implemented
- [x] White background configured
- [x] Dependencies installed and project compiled successfully
- [x] Development server running

## Features

- Client-side React component with TypeScript
- Responsive grid layout for price cards (3 columns on desktop, 1 on mobile)
- Monthly comparison table with conditional styling
- Mock data for SUI/HYPE, SOL/HYPE, and SOL/SUI pairs
- Percentage change indicators with color coding (green for positive, red for negative)
